data.text: Booked for a night in Transit. The facilities included price are fantastic Sauna/Massage/ indoor Pool. Breakfast first Class. Nothing is too much trouble. The staff are so polite and helpful. Nice to have free transport to the airport. Usually book a cheaper Hotel for transport, but will use this all the time now.
data.title: Brilliant Hotel.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear David Lee,

We would like to thank you for choosing our hotel and for your great review

It is always great when our guests with such a nice holiday experience as yours shares it with us and all Tripadvisor readers here.
We appreciate your kind praises toward our staff and service quality,

Looking forward to welcome and serve you and your loved ones again.

Best wishes,
IC Hotels
CRM Department
crm@ichotels.com.tr
owner_response.author: ICHotelsCRM

data.text: The actual hotel and facility was very nice but I had the weirdest experience at the spa. Male massage therapist was very creepy and I wouldn’t recommend getting a massage by the male therapist working there. He was very creepy and unprofessional and made me feel very uncomfortable. The spa experience was a let down but not an overall representation of other facilities of the hotel.
data.title: Spa experience was a let down!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guests (Ebunv),

We are so glad to hear that as the IC Hotels we fulfilled your expectations and your stay in our hotel has caused you so many enthusiastic emotions! 
We wish you to know that our top priority is to maintain our superior quality approach, and your feedback is highly important in helping us to review our processes, procedures and services.

However, in order to improve the quality of the service provided, we want to inform you that all your comments have been passed on to the responsible departments and senior management.

We would be delighted to accommodate you again in  one of IC Hotels.

Best Regards.
IC Hotels
CRM Department
crm@ichotels.com.tr
owner_response.author: ICHotelsCRM

data.text:
Выражаем большую благодарность сотруднику ресторана Рамазану за его вежливость, доброту, хорошее настроение, искренность, профессионализм, безукоризненную работу!
Постоянные гости отеля. 

Restoran çalışanı Ramazan'a nezaketi, nezaketi, iyi hali, samimiyeti, profesyonelliği ve kusursuz çalışması için derin şükranlarımızı sunuyoruz!
Otelin düzenli misafirleri.

We express our deep gratitude to the restaurant employee captain Ramazan for his politeness, kindness, good mood, sincerity, professionalism, and impeccable work!
Regular guests of the hotel.
data.title: Благодарность/Minnettarlık /Gratitude

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guests (Lamassu),

Thank you for your valuable review regarding your holiday at the IC Hotels Airport.

We would be happy to welcome you again soon for another great IC Hotels experience.

Best Regards,

CRM Department

data.text:
Great staff great service all round the man on reception was the nice person ever his name was Ibrahim. 
However the restaurant supervisors were a bit rude behaving like I was going to run off without paying. 
The lady who sells the spa package just would not stop harassing us and also the kids to buy creams and have packages etc
data.title: Good please but some staff let it down. Would stay again though

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest (Mal186338),

On behalf of the IC Hotels Airport, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our hotel for your vacation and for taking the time to share your experience with us.

We ara very pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and were very satisfied with the services . We really appreciate warm compliments about our staff, it is the greatest motivation for every one of us to maintain our standards and provide guests with the best service.

However, in order to improve the quality of the service provided, we want to inform you that all your comments have been passed on to the responsible departments and senior management.

We are happy to be part of a great memory of your trip and look forward to the pleasure to be your host again!

Kind regards,
IC Hotels
CRM Department
crm@ichotels.com.tr
owner_response.author: ICHotelsCRM

data.text:
We came to this Hotel in a crisis situation where all flights to UK cancelled due to radar software issue. I agree all good comments people made but I would like to emphasise the excellent front office guys Furkan and İbrahim who were brilliant to accommodate us and find the room. 
Restaurant personel is also very friendly, when we arrived late, meal was almost finished, they let kids to have meal, thank you all. 
This is very nice hotel with a nice clean rooms. All first floor updated and modernised. Meals  are delicious, which is big plus. Also hotel is full with airline personnel and Pilots :) 
Very nice and relaxing pool! 
Only improvement can be, SPA personnel has desk just before door to outside pool and every time you go in and out she asks whether we need spa service. 
Turkish tea you get usually is not good but it is like in your house in this hotel. I strongly recommend this hotel it is well worth the money you pay!
data.title: Fantastic Hotel with a very Helpful Front Office!!

owner_response.text:
